name: bridal-invitation-creator
description: An elegant web application that uses Gemini AI to generate beautiful, personalized bridal shower invitation cards.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && esbuild --bundle index.tsx --outfile=dist/bundle.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --minify --sourcemap --platform=browser --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" --define:process.env.API_KEY=\"${process.env.API_KEY || ''}\" && cp index.html dist/index.html
